name: Global Pandemic - Survival Horror Game
description:
*** EARLY ACCESS - WEEKLY UPDATES ***

The year is sometime soon...

A Global Pandemic has swept across the planet. Some say from animals, some say man-made in a factory, some say an act of God. The vast majority of the population of the planet died within months. Those that remained either "Turned" vicious and feral, or if immune to the pandemic, live their lives as bandits. All are dangerous.

You and your partner, Jo, are both immune. You survived through looting and using your own initiative. You were eventually captured by bandits, a group led by John Hardin. Having been captured by bandits, one night, you took your chance to escape. You made it. Jo did not, remaining a prisoner of the bandits. The hard truth is that John Hardin has moved on, to a place unknown, with his group - and Jo.

You have little to live for other than finding Jo, finding a place to call home, and find happiness once again.

Join the Discord server for frequent (at least weekly) updates and download for free: https://discord.com/invite/xaJP3t5

GAME NOTES

The game is in development and provided as early access. I aim to provide updates frequently - at least weekly. The Discord server (linked above) is the primary place for chat and game suggestions - I am very active on the Discord server. 

Right now I am hoping to build up a community of game testers to help steer the development of the game - join on on the Discord server.

All feedback is welcome and encouraged! :)

Thank you - stay safe!
Simon.
